check_box.label: Deferred Rendering
check_box.tool_tip: CPU: Medium |GPU: Medium - High |Performance: Medium |Graphics: High ||This option toggles Deferred Rendering, improves and softens lighting, allows infinite light sources, directional projector lights, realtime shadows, Screen Space Ambient Occlusion (SSAO) and more. This option is absolutely required for any of the advanced effects and tweaks to be visible.
check_box.name: Deferred

radio_item.label: No Water Reflections
radio_item.tool_tip: CPU: None |GPU: None |Performance: None |Graphics: None ||This option prevents everything from being reflected in water reflections.

radio_item.label: Terrain
radio_item.tool_tip: CPU: Low |GPU: Low |Performance: Low |Graphics: Low ||This option allows the terrain to be reflected in water reflections.

radio_item.label: Objects
radio_item.tool_tip: CPU: Low - Medium |GPU: Low |Performance: Low - Medium |Graphics: Low - Medium ||This option allows the terrain and objects to be reflected in water reflections.

radio_item.label: AVs
radio_item.tool_tip: CPU: Medium |GPU: Low - Medium |Performance: Medium |Graphics: Medium ||This option allows the terrain, objects and avatars to be reflected in water reflections.

radio_item.label: All
radio_item.tool_tip: CPU: Medium |GPU: Medium |Performance: Medium |Graphics: Medium ||This option allows everything to be reflected in water reflections.

check_box.label: Light Softening
check_box.tool_tip: CPU: Low |GPU: Medium |Performance: Low - Medium |Graphics: Medium ||This option toggles blurring for the light image used in Deferred Rendering. Affects whether shadows and SSAO are softened.
check_box.name: UseBlurLight

radio_item.label: No Shadows
radio_item.tool_tip: CPU: None |GPU: None |Performance: None |Graphics: None ||This option disables all realtime shadows.

radio_item.label: Sun & Moon
radio_item.tool_tip: CPU: Medium |GPU: Medium |Performance: Medium |Graphics: Medium ||This option allows only the sun and moon to cast a global shadow.

radio_item.label: Sun, Moon and Projectors
radio_item.tool_tip: CPU: Medium |GPU: Medium |Performance: High |Graphics: Medium - High ||This option allows projectors to cast shadows. Includes sun and moon shadows.

check_box.label: Volumetric Lighting
check_box.tool_tip: CPU: Low |GPU: Medium - High |Performance: Medium - High |Graphics: Medium ||This option toggles experimental volumetric lighting. This effect will create godrays if certain atmospheric criteria are met.
check_box.name: Godrays

check_box.label: Directional Volumetric Lighting
check_box.tool_tip: This option controls whether Volumtric Lighting should fade out when looking away from the sun.
check_box.name: RenderGodraysDirectional

check_box.label: Screen Space Ambient Occlusion
check_box.tool_tip: CPU: Low |GPU: Medium |Performance: Low |Graphics: Medium ||This option toggles Screen Space Ambient Occlusion (SSAO) emulating indirect lighting and the lack thereof giving objects a more realistic, less flat look.
check_box.name: UseSSAO

check_box.label: Screen Space Reflections
check_box.tool_tip: CPU: None |GPU: Medium - High |Performance: Medium |Graphics: Medium ||This option toggles cheap looking but performance costly reflections based on a copy what you see on screen.
check_box.name: RenderScreenSpaceReflections

check_box.label: Depth of Field
check_box.tool_tip: CPU: None |GPU: High |Performance: Low - High |Graphics: Medium ||This option toggles Depth of Field on or off, it is often used to blur out the background or unfocused parts of the scene.
check_box.name: UseDoF

check_box.label: Include Alphas into Depth
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggle if the Viewer should include alphas and particles into the depth map. This will affect whether alpha transparent surfaces block godrays and if said surface is considered a solid surface when blurring.
check_box.name: RenderDepthOfFieldAlphas

check_box.label: High Quality Depth of Field
check_box.tool_tip: CPU: None |GPU: High |Performance: High |Graphics: Medium ||This option toggles between the old, slow, high quality Depth of Field and the new, faster, lower quality Depth of Field.
check_box.name: RenderDepthOfFieldHighQuality

check_box.label: Tone Mapping
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles if Tone Mapping should be used while Deferred Rendering is active, it might cause the whole scene to look more/less colorfull and increase/decrease the overall scene brightness difference making the scene look dull
check_box.name: ToneMapping

check_box.label: Motion Blur
check_box.tool_tip: CPU: Medium |GPU: Low |Performance: Low - High |Graphics: Low - Medium ||This option toggles whether the Viewer should blur fast movement.
check_box.name: MotionBlur

check_box.label: Lens Flare
check_box.tool_tip: <icon>Stat_Dot0</icon> Performance <icon>Stat_Dot1</icon> Graphics <icon>ToolTip_Spacer</icon>This option toggles a lens reflection of the sun in your camera on or off.
check_box.name: LensFlare

check_box.label: Render World Lights
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles unattached normal and projected lights in Deferred Rendering on or off.
check_box.name: RenderDeferredLights

check_box.label: Render Self Attached Lights
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles rendering of lights which are attached to your own Avatar on or off.
check_box.name: attached_own_lights

check_box.label: Render Other Attached Lights
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles rendering of lights which are attached to other Avatars on or off. Useful for annoying facelights.
check_box.name: attached_other_lights

check_box.label: Render Attached Particles
check_box.tool_tip: Toggles rendering of particles which are attached to your or other Avatars on or off. Usefull for particle spammers
check_box.name: attached_particles

check_box.label: Enable Fullbright
check_box.tool_tip: Tell the Viewer to ignore the Fullbright flags on Object creation resulting in no Fullbrights until restart/revisit - WARNING! , does not work with Objects that use an old set prim attribute LIGHT script command!
check_box.name: EnableFullbright
